text:
Cool, new opening, I guess. They have a sure win lucky draw for every purchase. You have mcdonal drive thru, self order counter, and pick up counter, kinda crowded because people waiting for food collection. They also have alley BBT order counter.

Kinda love the combination of this petrol station!! Highly recommended!!
Impressive changes in this station with many new added services, with carwash and workshop services located at the back of the station. Nicely thought out and will be back!
Good renovation with a McDonald's attached to the place, we should do it here in Australia.

If you want to spend the rest of your remaining life getting a car wash, go here. It’s obvious the 2 workers don’t give a nickel about their job so why waste your hard earned money here! Thank you for wasting 40mins of my time :)
Strict no refund policy even for steering wheel cover. Tried to return it within 2 minutes and was denied even though I explained it doesn’t fit my steering wheel. 👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽
